description: Taco Tuesday never looked so tantalising with succulent slow-cooked Australian pork topped with homegrown Hass avocados in a salsa.
keywords: Slow-cooked Pork Tacos With Avocado Salsa
name: Slow-cooked Pork Tacos With Avocado Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.8 kg 100% Australian Boneless Roast Pork Shoulder

recipeInstructions.text: Place taco shells on serving plates. Fill with pork. Top with avocado salsa, cheese and coriander. Serve with lime wedges.
